choices: Ivan Johnson, a 22 year old college student. Lives with his girlfriend.
Eddie Mayneri, an 18 year old loser. Lives alone. (He's straight.)
Brett Brewbaker, a 44 year old scientist. Married with 3 daughters.

Seth Weldon, a 19 year old guitarist. Lives with his boyfriend.
1.content: Welcome to the wonderful world of Objectification! So, tell me. Whose tale do you wish to follow?
1.title: Aloha Stranger!

12.content:
*Beep*

........

*Beep*

........

*Beep*

Yes, I can hear it, but I really don't want to get up today.

*Beep*

Did you know that cold weather makes fingernails grow faster?

*Beep*
*Beep*

With a sigh, I surrender to the alarm and hit it hard out of spite. It's 10:13. I'm late.

Do you know why I didn't want to get up today? Because today is Monday, August 20th. Do you know what it is about Monday, August 20th that makes me not want to get up? Because Monday, August 20th is the day that my parents are making me go outside. To look for a job. Well, that, and the fact that I hate getting out of bed on any day. But that makes today especially annoying.

I throw on an old beat up punk outfit and hop onto my raggedy bike, ignoring personal hygiene.

Oh, I guess I have to introduce myself. The names Eddie. Eddie Mayneri. Occupation: Professional Freeloader. When I was little people called me a "problem child".

I'm currently living in a one bedroom apartment, which is paid for by my parents. The only catch is, I have to try looking for employment.

Of course, I'd never actually get a job. I have no work ethic, and I don't see what's so wrong with that. Most people never know true freedom. Most people are brainwashed. Are you truly free in a society where if you don't serve your master 8 hours a day, he won't give you your green paper, and your family will starve to death? Get real.

Anyway, I pretend to try my hardest, send out tons of resumes, then butcher any job interview I get. That way my parents think I'm really trying, and I get to keep my freedom. That's what I plan on doing today.

As I'm cycling along the road, something intriguing catches my eye. It's an old dirt road, that leads into a forest. Nobody ever uses it...I think. I don't think it goes anywhere either....but for some reason it seems to be....calling me. I feel like I should explore, but I can't just miss these interviews...."Meh, I have time to check it out real quick." I think aloud as I start cycling down the dirt road.

I only go for a short while before I come to a halt. There's a tall wired fence with a sign plastered to it that says "PRIVATE PROPERTY. NO TRESPASSING. YOU WILL REGRET.". "You will regret?" Does that mean they're going to shoot me? Or turn me over to law enforcement? Or did I stumble into a 90s horror movie? Pretty crude, but whoever posted this sign seems pretty badass. I suppose a smart person would turn around now. But I'm not smart.

I toss my bike over the fence, and then climb over it myself. I get on my bike and start peddling.

After about 10 minutes, the atmosphere around me....changes. I feel sorrowful for some reason, and the forest seems....dead. But, I can't stop peddling. "What the fuck is this place?..."

After about 20 more minutes, I come across some strange pit. I get off my bike, lean over and take a look. In the pit I can see a faint green light...is this a mining operation or something? But I don't see any ladders, or mining equipment...

It happens suddenly.

I feel a push. I'm falling. This is really happening. Someone definitely just pushed me. I'm definitely falling. And I'm definitely going to die here

All I can do is laugh. What a shitty life I had. And I'll never get another one. Ah, well. It's really funny, I think.

When I'm about to hit the bottom, I lose consciousness.


After awhile, I wake up. "I'm not dead?" I think to myself. "How am I not dead?" "I'm alive?!?!" I try to move, but I can't. I try to scream, but nothing happens. I can see, hear, feel, smell, and taste, but I can't move or speak. After examining my surroundings I seem to be in....
12.title: Eddie Mayneri, an 18 year old loser. Lives alon...

12131.title: A sock.

121311.content: You looked around and couldnt find out where you was. You looked at the bedroom and as a girl moving. It was melissa. She was kinda chubby and sweat alot during this time of the year. Some people make her down because she is chubby and doesnt wear expensive shoes even if she has such a nice personality. You worked with her a couple of time because nobody liked you. Then you noticed that she has woken up. She stood up and walked towards you. She grabbed your whole body with one hand as you were shocked. You were a left purple left sock. She walked back to the bed and sat down. She stretched your mouth wide open. She shoved her foot inside of your mouth as you tast her salty sole. She puts on the other one as she walked around making you pick up dirt from the floor. She dressed herself for school. She was infront of her shoes. She thinks what she will wear
121311.title: Malissa,the chubby girl in your class

14.content:
Hi im alex and i am usually not a rule breaker or a risk taker, but today i will change that. I want to know how it feels to not hear to adults so im about to steal candy from a baby! I know it sound ridiculous but hey i have to start small. So lets do it!

*steals a loliop from a little kid*

That felt...terrible wrong!

*the kid starts to cry*

Nonono here you can have it back!

*he crying got louder. Alex starts to get a headache*

Shut up! It hurts!

*alex passes out at found himself...*
14.title: Alex Krux, a 15 year old high school student.

1451.content: Alex sees alot of dolls and a messy floor. It could only be one place, his little sisters room. She wasnt unhygienic but she was very a hygienic one either. Maube its normal for a 9 year old girl but he didnt knew. He tried to move but failed. He soon realized that he was
1451.title: In his little sisters room

14512.content:
You were sitting onto a bed but you were much smaller compared to the bed and many things were on you but you didn't feel crushed.

"Please hurry or you are going to be late!" It was mom's voice!

"Don't worry, I am hurrying," it was your little 9 year old sister from the bathroom, but where are you, not your bedroom for sure.

You are answered when your little sister enters, and the weight on you has disappeared, your sister in a towel and holding a pile of clothes. She sets it down next to you and picks you up, "I'll be ready in a second mom," she hurries to put you on as your view switches to her soft young undeveloped face, to her smooth legs, the towel falls off her right before she steps through you, how does she do that? You wish you had a mirror.

You could tell when she pulled you up her legs that you were her panties, but what color you might not know, your face was pressed onto her little ladyhood before it got dark. Then it got even darker when she dressed herself with other clothing, she ran downstairs which jostled you up and she ran into the kitchen. "Ready mom,"

"Okay, take a bite of cereal and then we will go." She moves again and then you finally feel her slow down from a run to a skip. They were probably heading into the car now. During the car ride you felt a soft embrace from every direction though unlike the light clothing, you felt your sister who felt way too heavy, you couldn't move a muscle sadly. Even worse you had no idea where she was going as you felt her softness crush you, your body was feeling attracted to it but you know it wasn't you who wanted this, the body enjoyed it.

School, she spends an entire day at school

Dance rehearsal and then she visits a friend after that
14512.title: Rush

info.brief_description: You go sticking your nose where it doesn't belong, and end up transforming into an object.
info.description:
One day, you do something you know you shouldn't and it transforms you into an object.

There are four plotlines to choose from, and multiple transformations.

Rules:
Main character can only transform into objects.
Main character is never in a dominant position.
Nothing gay in the straight plotlines.
If you add a choice that ends the story, make sure there's another choice that allows for continuation.
I can edit/delete as I wish, and I will always provide a reason for doing so.

Enjoy!
